column4: What's the default password for 'root'? I tried all the password combinations that I know of to access 'roo't through 'su', but it's not working
when im on my user account in ubuntu, running gedit works fine, but when root, I get "Xlib: connection to ":0.0" refused by server" "Xlib: No protocol specified"
you mean you can't run sudo gedit or did you enable the root account ?
